name: ISO 9001:2015 Quality Management
scope: Design, development, and manufacturing of electronic accessories
description: This certificate demonstrates our commitment to quality management systems and continuous improvement in our manufacturing processes.

name: CE Marking Compliance
scope: Electronic devices and accessories for European market
description: CE marking indicates conformity with health, safety, and environmental protection standards for products sold within the European Economic Area.

name: FCC Equipment Authorization
description: FCC authorization for wireless devices ensuring compliance with electromagnetic compatibility and radio frequency emission standards.

name: RoHS Compliance Certificate
scope: Electronic products free from hazardous substances
description: Restriction of Hazardous Substances compliance ensuring our products are free from lead, mercury, cadmium, and other harmful materials.
